definition: checked pattern/square box character (in Chinese text) indicating illegible character

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
squared paper/graph paper/grid paper (manuscript paper with squares for Chinese characters)

sentences.english: The DM decides where the combatants are positioned on the battle grid.
sentences.chinese: 由DM決定參戰者位在戰鬥方格的何處。

sentences.english: Now suppose there are 100 igloos arranged in a rectangular grid.
sentences.chinese: 現在，假設有100座冰屋排成長方格形狀。

sentences.english: Please x your ideas in the little boxes on the form.
sentences.chinese: 請用x號在表格上的小方格內標出您的意見。

sentences.english: The three-variable Karnaugh map has eight squares.
sentences.chinese: 三變量卡諾圖有八個方格。

sentences.english: On the second, I'd like two grains of rice.
sentences.chinese: 在第二個方格上，我想要兩粒大米。

sentences.english: The piece of paper was squared off.
sentences.chinese: 這張紙劃了好多小方格子。

sentences.english: Figure 3 again shows how the cells of the cube are linearized.
sentences.chinese: 圖3給出了立方體的方格被線性化的另一個示例。

sentences.english: Please imprint your card face number in this box by pencil.
sentences.chinese: 請於方格內用鉛筆印壓您信用卡卡面的號碼。

sentences.english: It is advisable to count 100 squares as this obviates a fractional result.
sentences.chinese: 推薦計數100方格作爲排除少量的結果。

sentences.english: If you prefer not to receive any further mailings from us, please select the below box.
sentences.chinese: 若不願意繼續收到本會資訊，請選取下面方格。

sentences.english: Woven Rovings are fiberglass fabric woven of direct rovings.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃纖維布或稱方格布是由直接無捻粗紗機織而成。

sentences.english: What do you really think of your husband's red plaid blazer?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲你丈夫的那件紅色方格子夾克衫怎麼樣。

sentences.english: Please complete in English (BLOCK LETTERS) and tick where appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 請用英文大楷填寫，並在適當方格加上剔號。

sentences.english: Third, draw the location of individuals from the square on paper.
sentences.chinese: 於方格紙上畫出其所在位置。

sentences.english: Square the page off with your ruler.
sentences.chinese: 用尺在這頁紙上打上方格。

sentences.english: The drawing paper is neatly squared off.
sentences.chinese: 畫圖紙被整齊地劃成方格。

definition: squared paper/graph paper/grid paper (manuscript paper with squares for Chinese characters)
